mapper.update: update user_info set user_nick = #{userNick,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_gender = #{userGender,jdbcType=CHAR}, user_birthday = #{userBirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, user_location = #{userLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_avatar = #{userAvatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_signature = #{userSignature,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select user_id, user_nick, user_gender, user_birthday, user_location, user_avatar, created_at, updated_at, user_signature from user_info where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select user_id, user_nick, user_gender, user_birthday, user_location, user_avatar, created_at, updated_at, user_signature from user_info
